citeinfo.origin: Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission (FWC), Fish and Wildlife Research Institute (FWRI), Center for Spatial Analysis (CSA)
citeinfo.title: Florida Statewide Wildlife Management Areas

descript.abstract: This GIS data set represents the 2004-2005 Wildlife Management Areas administered by the Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission (FWC), and other associated public use areas. These data are intended as a general reference map only. More information on activities permitted in individual areas can be found from the links on FWC's Web site: http://myfwc.com/recreation/list.html.
descript.purpose: This GIS data set was created to represent a comprehensive statewide data set of Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission (FWC) Wildlife Management Areas.
descript.supplinf: Prior to July 1, 2004, the Fish and Wildlife Research Institute (FWRI) was known as the Florida Marine Research Institute (FMRI). The institute name has not been changed in historical data sets or references to work completed by the Florida Marine Research Institute. The institute name has been changed in references to ongoing research, new research, and contact information. (previous geoform was 'vector digital data')

place.placekey: St. Johns River Water Management District

idinfo.accconst: All data must be verified by Principal Investigator or Group Database Analyst prior to release. It is strongly recommended that this data is directly acquired from FWC and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. FWC makes no claims as to the data's suitability for other purposes.
idinfo.useconst: FWC-FWRI must be credited. This is not a survey data set and should not be utilized as such. These data are not to be used for navigation. Acknowledgement of the FWC-FWRI (Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission-Fish and Wildlife Research Institute) as the data source would be appreciated in any products developed from these data, and such acknowledgment as is standard for citation and legal practices for data source is expected by users of this data. Please cite the original metadata when using portions of the record to create a similar record of slightly altered data, such as reprojection. If any data are modified or adjusted, please share the edited information with FWC. Users should be aware that comparison with other data sets for the same area from other time periods may be inaccurate due to inconsistencies resulting from changes in mapping conventions, data collection, and computer processes over time. FWC shall not be liable for improper or incorrect use of this data. These data are not legal documents and are not to be used as such. This is not a survey data set and should not be utilized as such. These data are not to be used for navigation.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

attracc.attraccr: Attributes are accurate as the source data.

dataqual.complete: These data are complete for the state of Florida

horizpa.horizpar: Positional accuracy has not been determined and varies according to linework source. Some data have been edited to align with major roads and other landmarks that were

srcinfo.srccontr: Some boundaries from this source were used in the final data set. Some boundaries originated from this source, but were modified by FWRI staff.
These images were used as background reference and for heads-up digitizing features.

procstep.procdesc: Wildlife Management Area boundaries were produced by "heads-up" digitizing from 1999 USGS infrared imagery (DOQQ). In specified cases, Florida Natural Areas Inventory (FNAI) boundaries were used and modified based on the DOQQs (see SOURCE attribute). All boundaries are based on information from PDF maps of the Wildlife Management Areas from the FWC Outdoor Recreation Web site: http://myfwc.com/recreation/list.html and http://www.wildflorida.org/hunting/default.asp.

cntperp.cntorg: FWC-FWRI (Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission-Fish and Wildlife Research Institute)

cntaddr.address: Fish and Wildlife Research Institute 100 Eighth Avenue Southeast

attr.attrdef: Alternate name of managed area, or name of sub-area within managed area

attrdomv.udom: Alternate name of managed area, or name of sub-area within managed area

attr.attrdef: County name or names within which managed area lies

attrdomv.udom: County name or names within which managed area lies
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission (FWC) administrative region that area falls within

attrdomv.udom: Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission (FWC) administrative region that area falls within

attr.attrdef: Type of managed area; possible values include: Wildlife Management Area (WMA), Wildlife and Environmental Area (WEA), Public Use Area (PUA), Small Game Area (SGA), Stormwater Treatment Area (STA), Public Waterfowl Area (PWA), National Wildlife Refuge (NWR), Air Force Base (AFB), or Air Force Range (AFR)

attrdomv.udom: Type of managed area; possible values include: Wildlife Management Area (WMA), Wildlife and Environmental Area (WEA), Public Use Area (PUA), Small Game Area (SGA), Stormwater Treatment Area (STA), Public Waterfowl Area (PWA), National Wildlife Refuge (NWR), Air Force Base (AFB), or Air Force Range (AFR)

attr.attrdef: Total acreage within the specified managed area, not limited to the area of a particular polygon within the managed area; this is acreage reported from the WMA information online, not calculated in a GIS. A value of zero indicates there was no acreage listed in the PDF.

attrdomv.udom: Total acreage within the specified managed area, not limited to the area of a particular polygon within the managed area; this is acreage reported from the WMA information online, not calculated in a GIS. A value of zero indicates there was no acreage listed in the PDF.

distinfo.distliab: This data set is in the public domain, and the recipient may not assert any proprietary rights thereto nor represent it to anyone as other than a FWC-FWRI produced data set; it is provided "as-is" without warranty of any kind, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The user assumes all responsibility for the accuracy and suitability of this data set for a specific application. In no event will the staff of the Fish and Wildlife Research Institute be liable for any damages, including lost profits, lost savings, or other incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of or the inability to use this data set.

stdorder.fees: None. However, persons or organizations requesting information must provide transfer media if FTP is not available and must pay express shipping costs if express shipping is required.
stdorder.ordering: Contact GIS Librarian by e-mail, telephone, or letter explaining which products are needed and providing a brief description of how the products will be used. Also, provide name and address of the person or organization requesting the products.
stdorder.turnarnd: Usually within 10 business days, although, complex requests may take longer
